section.p: Later that day, you are set upon by a large gang of ruffians from the slums of Aku. They beat you savagely, rob you of up to 100 Shards, and leave you groaning in the gutter.
'Compliments of Lord Elbistan,' growls one of the ruffians as he gives you a parting kick.
Reduce your Stamina to 1, cross off the and .
When you are ready, you pick yourself up and limp into the city.
